rituals.name: Deep Breathing Exercise
rituals.description: Focus on your breath. In for four counts, hold for four, out for four. Ground yourself in the physical.
rituals.success_text: Your breathing steadies. The fog in your mind clears slightly. You feel more present.
rituals.failure_text: You try to focus on your breath, but intrusive thoughts keep breaking through.

rituals.name: Review Case Notes
rituals.description: Go through your evidence and notes methodically. Facts. Data. Concrete reality.
rituals.success_text: The familiar process of reviewing evidence grounds you. Facts are solid. Facts are real. You can trust facts.
rituals.failure_text: The notes don't make sense. The connections you thought you saw are gone. This isn't helping.

rituals.name: Physical Grounding Technique
rituals.description: Name five things you can see, four you can touch, three you can hear, two you can smell, one you can taste.
rituals.success_text: The sensory inventory pulls you back into your body. You are here. This is real. You are real.
rituals.failure_text: You try to focus on your senses, but they feel unreliable. Can you trust what you see? What you hear?

rituals.name: Cold Water Shock
rituals.description: Splash cold water on your face. The shock of it can cut through dissociation.
rituals.success_text: The cold water is a slap of reality. Sharp. Immediate. Undeniable. Your mind clears.
rituals.failure_text: The water feels wrong. Too thick. Too warm. Even this simple act feels corrupted.

rituals.name: Count Backwards from 100
rituals.description: A simple cognitive task to interrupt spiraling thoughts. Focus on the numbers.
rituals.success_text: The rhythm of counting is meditative. Each number a step back toward clarity. You reach zero feeling more centered.
rituals.failure_text: You lose track of the numbers. Was that 73 or 37? The sequence breaks apart in your mind.

rituals.name: Write Reality Affirmations
rituals.description: Write down concrete facts about yourself and your situation. Anchor yourself in truth.
rituals.success_text: Seeing the words in your own handwriting makes them more real. 'I am here. I am investigating. I am in control.'
rituals.failure_text: The words look foreign on the page. Are these even your thoughts? Your handwriting looks wrong.

rituals.name: Tactical Breathing (Box Breathing)
rituals.description: The breathing technique used by soldiers and first responders. Inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4.
rituals.success_text: The structured breathing pattern cuts through the chaos. Your heart rate slows. Your thoughts sharpen. You're back in control.
rituals.failure_text: You can't maintain the rhythm. Your breathing becomes erratic. The technique isn't working.

rituals.name: Progressive Muscle Relaxation
rituals.description: Systematically tense and release muscle groups. Start with your toes, work up to your head.
rituals.success_text: The physical release mirrors a mental one. Tension drains from your body. Your mind follows, becoming clearer and calmer.
rituals.failure_text: Your muscles won't cooperate. The tension won't release. You feel more wound up than before.
